interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 6 in 1 Curling Irons, Hair Curling Wand Set with Hair Straightener Brush, Hair Curler Wands with 0.3-1 Inch Interchangeable Barrels Instant Heat Up Hair Curling Iron with LCD Display & Temp Adjustment
Review Date: 2021/07/13
Store: GYCHEE
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'GYCHEE', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Max Temperature Setting': '232.2 Degrees Celsius', 'Heater Surface Material': 'Ceramic', 'Package Dimensions': '15.75 x 13.11 x 2.09 inches; 2.51 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'ZXQ-VL0214A', 'Manufacturer': 'GYCHEE'}
Review Text: It heats up very hot but it has all the right tools to make beautiful curls. I really like. Only have used 2 curlers so far and I am stuck with them because I like the way it looks! Highly recommended.
Review Title: This set is amazing
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
9A Body wave bundles with closure Brazilian human hair 4 bundles with lace closure Unprocessed Brazilian body wave virgin hair bundles with closure 4X4 Lace Middle Part (22 24 26 28+20) {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '12 x 6.1 x 2.2 inches; 1.2 Pounds', 'UPC': '699747934107'} I paid $189.99 for this hair that I had to take off 1 week after install. It's PURE GARBAGE. NOT human hair, NOT 9A grade. My hair burned when I tried to flat iron it at 250 degrees!. Tangled like crazy and shedded like a cat. I contacted the seller to tell them this hair was no good and they offered me a 30% refund IF I give them a GOOD (LYING) REVIEW. What a joke. Any other amazon seller would apologize for the inconvenience and offer you a replacement or refund to keep you happy. $189.99 dollars I will never see again. What a disappointment, trowed the whole bundles in the garbage and was forced to buy a wig.

DO NOT, I repeat DO NOT waste your money on this. Look for another amazon vendor and READ all 1 star reviews, those are the ones that really tell you how it is. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor high-quality beauty products, particularly cosmetics and hair care. Their recent purchase of a curling iron set reflects an expanding interest in versatile tools that enhance their styling capabilities while maintaining a high standard of quality.

- **Value for Money:** Although the user remains critical of overpriced items, their positive experience with both the eyelash and curling iron purchases indicates a growing willingness to invest in high-performing products that provide significant aesthetic benefits.

- **Experience with Vendors:** While the user is cautious regarding vendor integrity, their satisfactory interactions with recent purchases may encourage a broader exploration of reputable sellers who provide quality products and customer care.

- **Sentiment Towards Reviews:** They still rely heavily on credible reviews but have shown an increasing appreciation for products that surpass expectations, as evidenced by their enthusiastic review of the curling iron set.

- **Feedback and Resolution:** The user continues to expect satisfactory resolutions from vendors for underwhelming products. Their willingness to recommend effective items illustrates a developing trust in brands that deliver satisfaction.

- **Overall Attitude:** The user remains critical of misleading quality claims but is embracing products that genuinely prove effective. Recent positive experiences indicate a notable shift toward a more optimistic view of beauty and hair care products that meet their standards.
